26
27#include <sys/cdefs.h>
28#ifdef __FBSDID
29__FBSDID("$FreeBSD: head/lib/libproc/tests/target_prog.c 271937 2014-09-21 21:25:41Z markj $");
30#endif
31__RCSID("$NetBSD: target_prog.c,v 1.2 2015/09/24 14:12:48 christos Exp $");
32
33#include <err.h>
34#include <signal.h>
35#include <stdlib.h>
36#include <string.h>
37#include <unistd.h>
38
39static volatile sig_atomic_t saw;
40
41static void
42usr1(int sig __unused)
43{
44
45 saw = 1;
46}
47
48int
49main(int argc, char **argv)
50{
51
52 if (argc == 1)
53 return (EXIT_SUCCESS);
54 if (argc == 2 && strcmp(argv[1], "-s") == 0) {
55 if (signal(SIGUSR1, usr1) == SIG_ERR)
56 err(1, "signal");
57 if (kill(getpid(), SIGUSR1) != 0)
58 err(1, "kill");
59 return (saw == 1 ? EXIT_SUCCESS : EXIT_FAILURE);
60 }
61 return (EXIT_FAILURE);
62}
63
